name: Record of Agarest War Zero
description:
Long before the great Leonhardt brought the age of gods to an end, titanic forces met in battle across the world of Agarest, a mysterious land rich of history, heroic men, and beautiful women. The violent struggle between Light and Darkness seemed far from end. Only with the meeting between a young soldier named Sieghart and a mysterious girl named Mimel did the fate of Agarest begin to shift. Join Sieghart and his companions as they journey through vast lands and experience love, conflict, and betrayal in this venture of the Agarest War Saga.

Licensed to and published by Aksys Games.
